text: Noma Dumezweni (born 28 July 1969) is a South African-British actress. In 2006, she won the Laurence Olivier Award for Best Performance in a Supporting Role for her role as Ruth Younger in A Raisin in the Sun. In 2017, she won the Laurence Olivier Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role for her role as Hermione Granger in the original West End run of Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:South African actors Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:British voice actors Category:Swazi people Category:Laurence Olivier Award winners Category:Actors from Suffolk Category:Actors from London Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom
title: Noma Dumezweni
